title: "Untitled"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggmap)
library(leaflet)

adds <- data.table(Address = c("91 N 970 W, Orem UT","438 N 950 E, Orem, UT","730 S 200 W, Orem, UT","13961 Minuteman Dr, Draper, UT"), Label = c("Home","Homebase","Inlaws","Work"))[,c("lon","lat"):=geocode(Address)]
```

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
m <- leaflet() %>%
     addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
     addMarkers(lng=adds$lon, lat=adds$lat, popup=adds$Label, icon = makeIcon("C:/Users/cmcneil/Documents/Projects/Miscellaneous/Personal/Images/images.png",iconHeight=50,iconWidth=20,iconAnchorX=5,iconAnchorY=50))
m
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
